content.query:
-- ALTER VIEW kpivis.dim_tft
-- AS
SELECT
[DATA_TERRITORIO]
,[CICLO_TERRITORIO]
,[TFT_CICLO]
,[TFT_CICLO_ATUAL]
,[TFT_DATA]
,CAST([DATA] as DATE) as 'DATA'
,[TFT_TIPO_TERRITORIO]
,[TFT_TERRITORIO]
,[TFT_REP_AUSENTE_FLAG]
,[TFT_AFT_AUSENTE_FLAG]
,[TFT_GRI_AUSENTE_FLAG]
,[TFT_FARMA_AUSENTE_FLAG]
,[TFT_MOTIVO_AUSENCIA]
,[TFT_AUSENCIA_P1]
,[TFT_AUSENCIA_P2]
,[TFT_AUSENCIA_P3]
,[TFT_AUSENCIA_P4]
,[TFT_AUSENCIA_TOTAL]
,[TFT_ORIGEM]
,[TFT_ROW_ID_TERRITORIO]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://gsksynapseaccount.dfs.core.windows.net/gskoutputfiles/KPI Visitacao/dimensao_tft.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        [DATA_TERRITORIO]			VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[CICLO_TERRITORIO]			VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_CICLO]				VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_CICLO_ATUAL]			VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_DATA]					VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[DATA]						VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_TIPO_TERRITORIO]		VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_TERRITORIO]			VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_REP_AUSENTE_FLAG]		VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_AFT_AUSENTE_FLAG]		VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_GRI_AUSENTE_FLAG]		VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_FARMA_AUSENTE_FLAG]	VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_MOTIVO_AUSENCIA]		VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_AUSENCIA_P1]			VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_AUSENCIA_P2]			VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_AUSENCIA_P3]			VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_AUSENCIA_P4]			VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_AUSENCIA_TOTAL]		VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_ORIGEM]				VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
,[TFT_ROW_ID_TERRITORIO]	VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
    ) AS ROW
